recipe_name: Sweet potato mash with walnuts and pineapple
method: Put the potatoes and sweet potatoes in a pan of salted water and boil until tender.  Drain well and mash with the pineapple and crème fraiche.  Season well and stir in the walnuts. Turn into a heatproof dish and put under a hot grill until the surface is golden brown. Serve at once or make in advance and reheat in the oven, covered with foil.
ingredients: 1kg/2¼lb floury potatoes, peeled and cubed,  1kg/2¼lb orange sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed,  1 small tin pineapple chunks, drained and  finely chopped,  60g/2oz walnuts, chopped roughly,  4 tbsp crème fraiche,  salt and pepper
